title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose 'Zip File' to export.
OB: When trying to export multiple files with the same file name but under different directories to a zip file, the export process fails.
EB: The zip file export should successfully include all the files with the same name from different directories, without any errors or failures.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose 'Zip File' to export.
4. Verify that the export completes without any errors and that all the files with the same name from different directories are included in the zip file.
